name: Crash Site
description: You see your crashed ship with obvious signs of damage. You'll need to find tools to fix them. You take a look around and see paths to the North, East and South.

name: Frozen Tundra
description: Temperatures quickly dropped and now you're in the middle of a frozen tundra wasteland.  You don't see much around you except a barely visible path to the west

name: Crater
description: You fall into a large, but shallow crater.  You notice some plastic crates with some Tools sticking out.  Maybe you can fix your ship with it.  You also see some vegetation starting to grow on one end of the crater

name: Jungle
description: All you see is a densely packed jungle with lots of trees everywhere.  On a tree branch you spot a fruit that you can eat.  Hopefully it's not too poisonous

name: Beach
description: Looks like a very nice deserted beach.  You could picture yourself vacationing here if you hadn't crash landed and trying to fight to survive.  You do see a fish that washed up on shore though, maybe you can eat it. You also spot a small creek emptying out into the beach to the south.

name: Creek
description: Just a small freshwater creek here going up the mountain to the west.  The mountain looks pretty inaccessible from here though.  Maybe you can go around it.

name: Mountains
description: Looks like a pretty tall mountain with a path to the top.  You can vaguely spot something like a radio antenna at the top.  What could that be?

name: Alien Compound
description: Oh no, the aliens spot you and start to attack!

name: Far East Crater
description: You fall into dark and cold crater.  You see frozen ice on the surface.  Maybe you can dig a hole and replenish some water."

name: Abandoned Storage Facility
description: There is a sign of a life here. Search for useful things. I see a refrigerator still running, let's open it up!

name: Lava Tubes
description: There must been volcanic activities here. You see lava tubes erected. You can leverage the tubes as your protection from Aliens.

name: Abandoned Ship
description: Jackpot! Let's see what you can salvage from the abandoned ship.

name: South Crater
description: This crater looks too deep to check out. You never know what you'll encounter with down there.

name: Landing Site
description: You landed on a random planet. You are low on fuel. You take a look around and see paths to the East and West.

name: Alien Compound Combat
description: Oh no, the aliens spot you and start to attack!

name: Lava Tube
description: Looks like this can be a great shelter. Let's start a fire.

name: Rock Shrine
description: Up there lies a shrine, and once you're done paying your honors, you will obtain a new charm.

name: Dead Volcano
description: Looks like this volcano is not going to erupt but, looks like there are some parts still simmering under. You should be careful.

name: Fuel Outpost
description: Finally arrived at outpost. Refuel your ship and resupply your items.
